cbinstall.description: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Windows Live, Google, Instagram, Foursquare, GitHub, VKontakte, Steam, and Tumblr integration to Community Builder.

param.name: facebook_enabled
param.label: Enabled
param.description: Enable or disable Facebook integration. This allows quick enable or disable without having to clear parameters.

field.description: Click for additional information about this provider and configuration instructions.

param.name: facebook_application_id
param.label: App ID
param.description: Input Facebook application id or application key.

param.name: facebook_application_secret
param.label: App Secret
param.description: Input Facebook application secret.

param.name: facebook_permissions
param.label: Permissions
param.description: Select additional API permissions from connected Facebook users. Additional permissions allow for additional data to be retrieved on the users behalf.

param.name: facebook_callback
param.label: Callback URL
param.description: The provider callback url. This url should be supplied to the provider configuration as needed. This is sometimes also known as the redirect url.

param.name: facebook_register
param.label: Register
param.description: Enable or disable Facebook account registration. Register allows for non-existing Community Builder users to register with their Facebook account credentials.

param.name: facebook_link
param.label: Linking
param.description: Enable or disable Facebook account linking. Linking allows existing Community Builder users while logged in to link their Facebook account to their existing Community Builder account.

param.name: facebook_mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select if users should be registered immediately with Single Sign-on or if standard CB registration form should be pre-filled with their social site profile data. Note for pre-filled mode this provider field should be set to display on registration.

param.name: facebook_username
param.label: Username Format
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported username format override.

param.name: facebookUsernameSubstitutions
param.label: Username Substitutions
param.description: The additional supported substitutions for username format.

param.name: facebook_usergroup
param.label: Usergroups
param.description: Optionally select Facebook registration usergroups of users.

param.name: facebook_approve
param.label: Approval
param.description: Select Facebook registration to require admin approval.

param.name: facebook_confirm
param.label: Confirmation
param.description: Select Facebook registration to require email confirmation.

param.name: from
param.label: From Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize from on registration.

param.name: to
param.label: To Field
param.description: Select a field to synchronize to on registration.

param.name: facebook_button_style
param.label: Button Style
param.description: Select how Facebook button is displayed.

param.name: facebook_button_signin
param.label: Sign In Button
param.description: Optionally input alternative title for Facebook Sign In button. If left blank will default to "Sign In".

param.name: facebook_button_link
param.label: Link Button
param.description: Optionally input alternative title for Facebook Link button. If left blank will default to "Link".

param.name: facebook_firstlogin
param.label: First Redirect
param.description: Input optional Facebook first time login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).

param.name: facebook_login
param.label: Redirect
param.description: Input optional Facebook login redirect URL (e.g. index.php?option=com_comprofiler).
